sentences.en: An ounce is one sixteenth of a pound.
sentences.cn: 一盎斯是十六分之一磅.

sentences.en: Beginning in the sixteenth century many Greek classics were translated into the popular languages.
sentences.cn: 从十六世纪开始,许多希腊的经典著作被译成了通俗的语言.

sentences.en: But in the course of history, we settled beginning in the sixteenth and seventeenth century, down into just two patterns: what we call the major pattern and the minor pattern.
sentences.cn: 但在历史的发展过程中,在十六到十七世纪期间,人们最终确定了下列两种模式,我们称之为大调模式和小调模式

sentences.en: Contemporary photographs are juxtaposed with a sixteenth century, copper Portuguese mirror.
sentences.cn: 几幅当代照片和一面16世纪的葡萄牙铜镜并排摆在一起。

sentences.en: During the sixteenth century the intellectual climate in many parts of Europe was slowly changing.
sentences.cn: 在16世纪,欧洲很多地方知识界的态度慢慢改变了.

sentences.en: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们的寒假放假时间是从一月十六号截至到二月七日。

sentences.en: He became the sixteenth, and some say one of the greatest presidents this country ever had.
sentences.cn: 他荣任第十六届美国总统，有些人说他是本世纪最伟大的总统之一。

sentences.en: He has entered on his sixteenth year.
Herbalists dominated the sixteenth century botanical world.
sentences.cn: 本草学家在十六世纪曾统治了整个植物界.

sentences.en: Now then an agreement entered into this sixteenth day of Octoberwrite that first.
sentences.cn: 现在你先写上:“本合同订于十月十六日. ”

sentences.en: Only one sixteenth of her was black, and that sixteenth did not show.
sentences.cn: 她只有十六分之一的黑人血统, 而那十六分之一表面上又看不出来.

sentences.en: She lived on the sixteenth floor.
The man is a sixteenth Spanish navigator.
sentences.cn: 那个人是十六世纪的航海家.

sentences.en: the site of a sixteenth century abbey
sentences.cn: 一座十六世纪的修道院的旧址

sentences.en: This objection had been voiced even in the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: 早在十六世纪已经有过这种反对的意见了.

sentences.en: Tobacco was introduced into Europe in the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: 烟草在十六世纪传入欧洲.

sentences.en: Use of named rootstocks of known vigor did not begin until the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: 十六世纪以前,还没开始利用已经知道生长势的知名砧木.

sentences.en: We're studying dramatic texts by sixteenth century playwrights.
sentences.cn: 我们正在研究16世纪戏剧作家的戏剧文本.

words.tran_cn: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
第六十的；六十分之一的
月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一

trans.tran_cn: 第十六的，十六分之一的
第十六，月的第十六日，十六分之一
trans.tran_en: one of 16 equal parts of something
one of 16 equal parts of something
